metadata.title: 2003 U.S. Groundfish Survey of the Eastern Bering Sea Shelf

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: Groundfish catch data includes biological data such as length, weight, age, and species composition.  The vessel was named F/V Arcturus (USA).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Primarily to provide resource assessment estimates to management.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Check with Contributor or Source.

Use constraints: Check with Contributor or Source.
